import React, { useState } from "react"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; export const ModalAddNewProject = (props) => { const [name, setName] = useState(''); const sendProjectInfo = () => { props.onSend(name); } const projectName = (event) => { setName(event.target.value) } React.useEffect(() => { const exampleModal = document.getElementById("exampleModal"); exampleModal.addEventListener("show.bs.modal", () => { const modalTitle = exampleModal.querySelector(".modal-title"); modalTitle.textContent = "Creacte a New Imperial Project"; }); }); return (

); }; ModalAddNewProject.propTypes = { onSend: PropTypes.func, };
